heading: HB00539
0: AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING A PRE-HOSPITAL EMERGENCY MEDICAL CARE SYSTEM, PROVIDING FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT, SUPERVISION AND REGULATION OF THE PRE-HOSPITAL EMERGENCY CARE PROFESSION, PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS THEREOF AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2017-10-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00539
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING A PRE-HOSPITAL EMERGENCY MEDICAL CARE SYSTEM, PROVIDING FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT, SUPERVISION AND REGULATION OF THE PRE-HOSPITAL EMERGENCY CARE PROFESSION, PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS THEREOF AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
SHORT TITLE : Pre-hospital Emergency Care
ABSTRACT : Creates the National Pre-Hospital Care Council to design policies, standard protocols, research, technology and education for emergency medical services. Adopts an emergency number under the National Telecommunication Council.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : YAP, VICTOR A.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Panotes (039 2016-10-19)2. Primicias-Agabas (060 2017-01-23)
3. Catamco (000 2018-01-24)4. Nieto (000 2018-02-19)
5. Belmonte (R.) (000 2018-02-14)6. Tambunting (000 2018-11-15)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2017-10-02
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON CIVIL SERVICE AND PROFESSIONAL REGULATION
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO HEALTH on 2016-07-27;
